TextView.android:text: Kawach is an app that acts as a saviour for all the victims of abuse be it be a woman or a child. This is an app to empower the sections of society who are considered to be weak and vulnerable even today!!

As soon as the alert button on the front page is pressed, a message with the person's current location,will be sent to the three contacts entered. Moreover any other person can report any kind of ill-behaviour with a child or a woman. The person can get location and take picture of the situation and submit it to nearest police station. The phone numbers(emergency) should be saved in settings to send message.
An app created for the OpenGovDataHack by: Team NA'VI-- - Mayank Kumar - Abhishek Kumar - Akash Pandey - Aditi Roy
